releases.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles
releases.name: v0.2.1

releases.body:
- the first release using TravisCI for building and testing
- merge annotations and profiles into one archive
releases.name: v0.2.0

latest.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles
latest.name: v0.2.1

releases.body:
#### Added
- add detailed logging when fetchand and updating software releases
- automatically check for new software releases every 12 hours

#### Changed
- tighten panel padding for HMM cluster members table (#958)

#### Fixed
- fix broken multi-sample selection (#960)
- fix file size display in client (#956)
- fix non-functional software update fetching
- fix incorrect type for file document `size` field in database (#956)
- fix visual stacking bug in job clear dropdown (#964)

#### Removed
- removed use of `public` reference field in client
releases.name: v3.0.0-alpha.5

releases.body:
#### Added
- add read size and host information to sample detail
- add locale field to sample edit UI (#934)
- allow changing a users role between _Limited_ and _Administrator_
- show access forbidden alert in users view for limited users
- show admin icon tag for administrator users where appropriate

#### Change
- change `per_page` pagination query value default to `25`
- hide file removal button for users without `remove_file` permission
- hide reference creation UI for unpermitted users (#939)
- hide subtraction modification UI for unpermitted users
- make pathoscope table information more accurate and informative (#946)
- remove unused action types
- use full auto scrolling pagination and remove _Load More_ button (#951)

#### Fixed
- fix inability to add user to group (#943)
- fix allowing administrators to change own roles (#937)
- fix pathoscope UI bugs (#945)
- fix sample detail refresh when upload complete
- fix sample right editing API route (#942)
releases.name: v3.0.0-alpha.4

releases.body:
#### Added
- add toggleable removal of extreme peaks from coverage charts using [IQR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interquartile_range)
- extend reference navigation breadcrumbs (#923)

#### Changed
- many client code improvements by @Miminko 
- update some API error responses to make them more semantically correct

#### Fixed
- fix group management UI bugs (#928)
- fix missing `reference.id` for created sequences
- fix some error handling in client
- fix unhandled exception when fetching newer Genbank records without GIs (#930)
releases.name: v3.0.0-alpha.3

releases.body:
#### Fixed
- include missing `numpy` modules in build
releases.name: v3.0.0-alpha.2

releases.body:
#### Added
- add administrator user class instead of group
- add graphic view of job progress 
- add HMM purge function
- add not found (404) notifications for missing data records
- add sidebar to application layout
- allow multiple sample selection for quick analysis
- change _virus_ to generic _OTU_ (Operational Taxonomic Units) to support non-virus pathogens
- implement client software testing
- implement reference support
- implement remote reference support
- make tracking of long-lived processes more robust
- support cloning of existing references
- support new reference operations in OTU history
- support small RNA samples
- update some API endpoints
- use scrolling auto-paging instead of manual pagination

#### Changed
- move administrative settings to user dropdown menu rather than navigation bar
- improve server debug logging in some areas
- improve software update interface
- make real-time updates (websockets) more robust
- support multiple references in quick analyze context
- upgrade icon set


#### Removed
- remove GitHub username and token settings
- remove index build notification in navigation bar
releases.name: v3.0.0-alpha.1

releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fixes unhandled `RuntimeError` during real-time communication that may be causing job instability (#769)
releases.name: v2.3.2

#### Fixed
- fix missing version in release build

releases.body:
#### Changed
- add scroll bar to create sample file selector component
- list up to 500 uploaded read files in create sample interface

#### Fixed
- fix inability to create samples from files not accessible through the create sample interface
releases.name: v2.2.3

releases.body:
#### Changed
- include `libcrypto` in distributable
- include `libssl` in distributable

#### Fixed
- resolves issues running on Centos
releases.name: v2.2.2

releases.body:
#### Changed
- improve appearance of software updates list
- only allow integer values for resource and task limits in job settings
- report SPAdes out-of-memory error more explicitly
- run `reunite_pairs` in separate process to prevent unhandled pipe error
- update appearance of task arguments in NuVs job detail

#### Fixed
- fix broken inputs for proxy settings (#525)
- fix unhandled client error when `onChange` is not defined for `<InputSave />`
- fix remaining issues in job limit settings interface (#495, #474)
- fix long decimals for read values in Pathoscope results (#522)
- resolve cases where `paired` property of sample was not correctly derived during analysis
releases.name: v2.2.1

releases.body:
#### Added
- allow filtering of viruses by `verified` tag (#470)
- allow toggling of Sentry-based server error reporting (#508)
- backend validation of job resource setting values (#475)
- bring back previously deprecated subtraction nicknames (#460)
- consistent styling and handling of input errors (#404, #436)
- return `404` for analysis requests to the API when the sample does not exist
- return `404` for settings sample rights if sample does not exist
- return `409` for subtraction creation if id already exists
- return `409` for subtraction remove if it has linked samples
- send job error data to developers via Sentry (#466)
- show alert in analysis list when no virus index is available
- show placeholder when non-ready analysis is viewed
- validate source types passed to the API

#### Changed
- add missing `Location` headers for some API endpoints (#431)
- remove deprecated index document and API payload fields
- do not return errors for unknown search params on sample find endpoint (#448)
- improve control of sample rights through API
- make remove sample API handler more efficient
- return `201` status when a subtraction creation succeeds
- show error when create subtraction requests fail due to a passing an already existing name
- simplify numerous API error messages
- tweak small screen responsive breakpoint
- update most Javascript dependencies

#### Removed
- hide remove icon and functionality for subtractions with linked samples (#435)
- removed autofill functionality in sequence edit form (#505)

#### Fixed
- fix broken autohide of some modal forms on submit
- fix broken paging in file listings (#502)
- fix broken remove job button (#516)
- fix incorrect modification counts in indexes list (#410)
- fix issue with consistently updating user permissions when group membership or permissions change (#425, #452)
- fix `KeyError: 'diagnosis'` when requesting in-progress analyses (#511)
- fix missing autofetch after HMM install (#461)
- fix unwanted shift in pathoscope result list (#419)
- validate API key name to fix bugs due to empty name string (#434)
releases.name: v2.2.0

releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fixed issue with file pagination (#503)
releases.name: v2.1.4

releases.body:
#### Changed
- improve danger alert colors (#465)

#### Fixed
- fix memory leak in relative time fields (#464)
- fix `TypeError: n.inputNode.blur is not a function` (#467)

releases.body:
#### Fixed
- only disable NuVs when HMMs unavailable (#456)
releases.name: v2.1.2

releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fixed recurrent unhandled `Object of type 'Response' is not JSON serializable` exception (#449, #397)
releases.name: v2.1.1

releases.body:
#### Added
- add alert to sample analyses list when no ready virus index is available (#371)
- add several input error messages where previously missing (#404)
- add UI and API functionality for adding email address values to user accounts (#369)
- add UI and API functionality for managing virus schemas (#102)
- add UI and API functionality for selecting schema segments for isolate sequences (#405)
- add notification widget in nav bar (#392)
- alert user to software updates in notification widget (#392)
- allow Pathoscope coverage chart download as PNG (#366)
- disable NuVs and alert user in analyses list when HMM data is not installed (#353)
- fully validate user creation requests (#412)
- prevent analyze requests when no ready virus index is available (#371)
- prevent NuVs analyze requests when no HMM data is available (#353)
- validate password lengths in all password change forms (#421)
- validate sample name fields in creation form (#413)

#### Changed
- change HMM endpoint URLs to make more semantic sense
- don't logout clients authenticated by API key
- move sample group editing from separate API endpoint to edit endpoint
- return `204 No content` from revert history endpoint
- standardize input field error notifications (#404)
- update all instances of danger red color to match brand colors
- update endpoints to match public API docs (#290)

#### Fixed
- fix API key user interface issues
- fix bug  in `QuickAnalyze` modal form
- fix issue in BLAST sagas
- fix unhandled `404` when changing user password in admin UI (#417)
releases.name: v2.1.0

releases.body:
#### Added
- use validation in subtraction creation API endpoint
- raise specific exception `ClientError` when client files are missing (#393)

#### Fixed
- fix unhideable create user modal (#388)
- fix failing cancellation of waiting jobs (#387)
- fix lagging version displayed in client ui after software update
- fix unhandled `TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable` (#382)
- fix unhandled `ValueError: is not valid SemVer string` (#380)
releases.name: v2.0.5

releases.body:
#### Added
- add dict-like features to `app_settings.Settings` class
- allow configuration and use of a proxy server for outgoing requests
- allow skipping of database checks and settings initialisation
- allow  `paginate()` handler utility function to take `pymongo`-style sort list
- add sample quality chart axis labels
- gracefully show error page when client files missing
- show analysis item placeholder in list in list before analyze request returns
- use `aioinotify ` instead of `inotify` to watch files
- warn user when leaving page while upload in progress

#### Changed
- avoid use of `hasOwnProperty` in `websocket.js`
- clean up `AnalysisDetail` component
- pip upgrade `aiohttp`
- pip upgrade `raven`
- refactor `test_app.py`
- reorganize `organize.py` module

#### Removed
- remove Gitter link from readme

#### Fixed
- ensure that JSON-formatted error responses are returned at all API endpoints
- fix client error when uploading files (#385)
- fix issue when adding isolate in client
- fix floating filter button in pathoscope results
- fix issue with connecting to non-local Mongo host (#373)
- improve rendering of pathoscope coverage charts
- improve sample quality chart print layout
- upgrade distutils `setup.py` and `cx-freeze` to fix build issues
releases.name: v2.0.4

releases.body:

##### Server

- re-implement file watching system to use inotify and function as a Virtool collection

##### Package
- remove 'scripts' directory

latest.body:
#### Fixed
- fixes unhandled `RuntimeError` during real-time communication that may be causing job instability (#769)
latest.name: v2.3.2

releases.body:
The release consists of a gzipped JSON file containing:

- a `data_type` field with value _genome_
- an `organism` field with value _virus_
- the `version` name (eg. *v0.2.0*)
- a timestamp with the key `created_at`
- virus data compatible for import into Virtool v2.0.0+

Scripts have been updated to follow upcoming convention changes in Virtool v3.0.0.
releases.name: v0.3.0

releases.body:
The first release of the database using the new format.

The release consists of a gzipped JSON file containing:

- the version name (eg. *v0.2.0*)
- a timestamp with the key ``created_at``
- the virus data compatible for import into Virtool v2.0.0+
releases.name: v0.2.0

latest.body:
The release consists of a gzipped JSON file containing:

- a `data_type` field with value _genome_
- an `organism` field with value _virus_
- the `version` name (eg. *v0.2.0*)
- a timestamp with the key `created_at`
- virus data compatible for import into Virtool v2.0.0+

Scripts have been updated to follow upcoming convention changes in Virtool v3.0.0.
latest.name: v0.3.0
